explanations.classification: The paper uses the classification and regression trees (CRT) method to identify socio-economic features of agricultural households at risk of financial exclusion, which involves classifying households based on their financial behavior.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions the use of regression trees as part of the CRT method, which implies the use of regression techniques to analyze the data.
explanations.decision tree: The paper explicitly states the use of the decision tree method (CRT) to analyze the data and identify features of households at risk of financial exclusion.
